name: Nova Flow
description: Nova Flow is a First-Person Platformer. Using your Nova Cannon and its powers, you must traverse the terrain, finding the shortcuts along the way to set the fastest times.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 / Windows® 8 / Windows® 10 32-bit (latest Service Pack) Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 2120 or equivalent AMD Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GT 730 or AMD Radeon™ R7 240 Series DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space Sound Card: Compatible Sound card Additional Notes: Minimum requirements may change before release.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 / Windows® 8 / Windows® 10 32-bit (latest Service Pack) Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 2400 or equivalent AMD Processor Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GT 1030 or AMD Radeon™ RX 550 or better DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space Sound Card: Compatible Sound card Additional Notes: Recommended requirements may change before release.
